Madison.John R. Commons House:
The John R. Commons House (also commonly known as Hocheera) is a historic house located at 1645 Norman Way in Madison, Wisconsin. It is regarded as locally and nationally significant due to its association with John R. Commons.


== History ==
Designed by Cora Tuttle, the two-story Bungalow style house was built in 1913 for its original owner John R. Commons, a prominent member of the faculty at the University of Wisconsin-Madison, and his wife, Ella.
